name: @mytiki/intg-shopify-local-env
description: Local development server for TIKI Shopify App

scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend,dev-server "npm run dev-backend" "npm run dev-frontend" "npm run build && npm run start"
scripts.dev2: concurrently "npm run dev-backend" "npm run dev-frontend" "npx tsc --watch" "nodemon -q dist/index.js"

author: The TIKI Team
